title: Wrangell - St Elias National Park & Preserve: Our Staff & Offices
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Management     Our Staff & Offices               Our Staff & Offices      Wrangell - St. Elias National Park & Preserve PO Box 439106.8 Richardson Highway Copper Center, AK 99573907-822-5234The headquarters for Wrangell-St. Elias National Park & Preserve is located at mile 106.8 Richardson Highway, in Copper Center, Alaska. Most park staff are located here. The park superintendent and most administrative personnel are stationed at park headquarters.We have staff stationed in the following locations:North District (Nabesna and Headquarters): The park adminnistration offices and the Wrangell-St. Elias Visitor Center are part of this district in Copper Center, and the Slana Ranger Station is located further north in this district in the Nabesna area.South District (Kennecott): The Kennecott Visitor Center and Chitina Ranger Station are located here.Yakutat District (Coastline): The Yakutat District Office is located here.Gulkana Operations Center: This is where park dispatch and flight operations are located.Please go to the Contact Us page for phone numbers, fax numbers, and the park email address.
